availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert B. Kiddoo (Nicholas County, KY, attorney)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, attorney. Pennsylvania native. Attorney in Nicholas County from 1860 to 1866.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1, p. 279.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 23, Nicholas County, Kentucky, 1866, p. 148 (p. 133 of microfilm) (Accessed via ancestry.com).
